Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.MapConvertible
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildAction, MoveAction, SetupAction
    public class Action
extends MapConvertible
implements java.io.Serializable
    represents a generalization of the actions that a worker can perform
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      boolean matches​(java.lang.String workerID, int targetX, int targetY, Piece piece)
      Checks if this action is performed by the given worker, is contextual to the given piece, and has as its actual target the space identified by the arguments targetX and targetY Always returns false for this class, but can have different return values for its subclasses

      • Action

        public Action​(java.lang.String workerID,
              int targetX,
              int targetY)
        constructs a basic action
        Parameters:
        workerID - the id of the worker that performs the action. Contains info about the id of the player that owns it
        targetX - the x coordinate on the board of the designated action
        targetY - the y coordinate on the board of the designated action

      • fromMap

        public static Action fromMap​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> map)
        converts a map to an Action object, if possible supports dynamic types by reading the related information from the map and calling the adequate dynamic version of the fromMap method In practice, simulates overriding this method, because java doesn't natively allow overriding static methods
        Parameters:
        map - the map to convert to an Action object
        Returns:
        the appropriate subclassed action converted from the map

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • matches

        public boolean matches​(java.lang.String workerID,
                       int targetX,
                       int targetY)
        checks if this action is performed by the given worker, and has the given target X and Y as its actual target
        Parameters:
        workerID - the id of the worker object of the query
        targetX - the x coordinate of the target space
        targetY - the y coordinate of the target space
        Returns:
        true if the action is performed by the given worker and has the given target as its actual target

      • matches

        public boolean matches​(java.lang.String workerID,
                       Piece piece)
        Checks if this action is performed by the given worker and is contextual to the given piece Always returns false for this class, but can have different return values for its subclasses
        Parameters:
        workerID - the id of the worker object of the query
        piece - the piece to use for the query
        Returns:
        true if this action matches the arguments of the call

      • matches

        public boolean matches​(java.lang.String workerID,
                       int targetX,
                       int targetY,
                       Piece piece)
        Checks if this action is performed by the given worker, is contextual to the given piece, and has as its actual target the space identified by the arguments targetX and targetY Always returns false for this class, but can have different return values for its subclasses
        Parameters:
        workerID - workerID the id of the worker object of the query
        targetX - the x coordinate of the target space
        targetY - the y coordinate of the target space
        piece - the piece to use for the query
        Returns:
        true if this action matches the arguments
